title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, November 4, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss describes skirmishing with Federal troops, and numbers of prisoners taken. He also comments on food supplies for the winter at home.
keywords: Troop Movement, Battle Description, Prisons/Prisoners, Death/Casualties, National Government, African Americans, Slavery, Women, Military Authority, Home Front, American Civil War
